My name is **Thomas Giannetti-Fakhoury**, I am 22 years old and I was born in Cannes in the South of France. I am both **French** and **Ivorian** and am also of ***Lebanese*** and ***Italian*** origin.

### My education & My Work.

I studied Finance at **Bocconi University**, FinTech during a Summer Programme at **Oxford University**,Data Science at **Le Wagon** in London and am currently reading for the Masters in Analytics and Management at **London Business School**. 

I worked as a financial analyst for **PFO Group**, a private equity analyst intern at **AfricInvest Group** and a TEDx Organiser with **TEDxTreichville**.
